title: Autoattacking a plant should NOT use up Sona's Power Chord
body: As a level 7 Sona main, this drives me nuts. Why does auto-attacking a plant with Power Chord active consume the Power Chord? Auto-attacking a ward does not consume the Power Chord, so why are plants different? I know this is just a minor thing, but I would appreciate if this change was considered.

Same with {{champion:78}}'s Buckler.

To add insult to injury, hitting the plant with it doesn't even count as a kill so it isn't automatically returned to you; you have to go pick it up yourself.
Poppy being my main jungler, I can agree with this. Either have it not waste the buckler or have it auto return, which would make jungle clear stronger.
